source:
var df = spark.sql("""WITH RejectionCTE
AS (
	SELECT (labor.approvalDetails.actualApprover) AS ActualApprover
		,(labor.partner) AS Partner
		,(labor.assignmentDetails.customerName) AS CustomerName
		,CASE 
			WHEN labor.laborNotes = ''
				THEN 'No'
			ELSE 'Yes'
			END AS NotesPresent
		,CASE 
			WHEN (
					(
						labor.actionDetails [0].actionType = 'Rejection'
						OR labor.actionDetails [1].actionType = 'Rejection'
						OR labor.actionDetails [2].actionType = 'Rejection'
						)
					AND (
						labor.actionDetails [0].reasonId = 333031
						OR labor.actionDetails [1].reasonId = 333031
						OR labor.actionDetails [2].reasonId = 333031
						)
					)
				THEN 'Rejected'
			ELSE 'Approved'
			END AS ApprovedRejected
		,Count(*) AS Count
	FROM tbl_LaborTransactionAudit
	WHERE labor.laborDate > ADD_MONTHS(CURRENT_DATE(), -3)
		AND labor.laborNotes = ''
		AND labor.partner = 'aurora'
		AND labor.laborStatus NOT IN (
			'Submitted'
			,'Deleted'
			)
	GROUP BY (labor.approvalDetails.actualApprover)
		,(labor.assignmentDetails.customerName)
		,(labor.partner)
		,CASE 
			WHEN labor.laborNotes = ''
				THEN 'No'
			ELSE 'Yes'
			END
		,CASE 
			WHEN (
					(
						labor.actionDetails [0].actionType = 'Rejection'
						OR labor.actionDetails [1].actionType = 'Rejection'
						OR labor.actionDetails [2].actionType = 'Rejection'
						)
					AND (
						labor.actionDetails [0].reasonId = 333031
						OR labor.actionDetails [1].reasonId = 333031
						OR labor.actionDetails [2].reasonId = 333031
						)
					)
				THEN 'Rejected'
			ELSE 'Approved'
			END
	)
	,FilteredRejectionApproved
AS (
	SELECT ActualApprover
		,Partner
		,CustomerName
	FROM RejectionCTE
	GROUP BY ActualApprover
		,Partner
		,CustomerName
	HAVING COUNT(1) > 1
	)
	,FinalFilter
AS (
	SELECT R.*
	FROM RejectionCTE R
	LEFT JOIN FilteredRejectionApproved F ON R.ActualApprover = F.ActualApprover
		AND R.Partner = F.Partner
		AND R.CustomerName = F.CustomerName
	WHERE R.ActualApprover IS NOT NULL
		AND F.ActualApprover IS NULL
	)
	,CalculatedRejection
AS (
	SELECT R.ActualApprover
		,R.Partner
		,R.CustomerName
		,R.NotesPresent
		,Rejected
		,Approved
	FROM RejectionCTE AS R
	JOIN FilteredRejectionApproved F ON R.ActualApprover = F.ActualApprover
		AND R.Partner = F.Partner
		AND R.CustomerName = F.CustomerName
	PIVOT(SUM(R.Count) FOR ApprovedRejected IN (
				'Approved'
				,'Rejected'
				))
	WHERE Rejected * 100 / (Approved + Rejected) >= 20
	)
SELECT UUID() AS Id
	,LOWER(F.ActualApprover) AS ActualApprover
	,F.Partner
	,LOWER(F.CustomerName) AS CustomerName
	,F.NotesPresent	
	,'Labor against similar assignments have seen a high rejection by approvers when submitted with no/insufficient labor notes.' AS Message
	,current_timestamp() AS UpdatedDateTimeUTC
FROM FinalFilter F
WHERE ApprovedRejected = 'Rejected'

UNION

SELECT UUID() AS Id
	,LOWER(ActualApprover) AS ActualApprover
	,Partner
	,LOWER(CustomerName) AS CustomerName
	,NotesPresent
	,'Labor against similar assignments have seen a high rejection by approvers when submitted with no/insufficient labor notes.' AS Message
	,current_timestamp() AS UpdatedDateTimeUTC
FROM CalculatedRejection""")

val outputfile = "wasbs://rejectedlaborrecommendation@lmtsalrscoreuateastus.blob.core.windows.net/"  
var filename = "rejectionInsights"
var outputFileName = outputfile +  filename 


df.coalesce(1).write.format("json").option("header", "true").mode("overwrite").save(outputFileName)
